mapper.select: select id_store, store_name, muslim_friendly, location_region, food_category, address, tel, working_time, days_closed, parking, image, thumb_image, lat, lng, hits, active from store where active = 1

select id_store, store_name, muslim_friendly, location_region, food_category, address, tel, working_time, days_closed, parking, image, thumb_image, lat, lng, hits, active from store where active = 1 and id_store=#{id_store}
select p.*, ( select count(*) from review where id_store = #{id_store} ) as reviews from store p where id_store = #{id_store} and active = 1
